scenario.name: Slingshot: Invite and Wait
scenario.send:
INVITE [$CONTACT_REMOTE] SIP/2.0 Via: [$VIA_LOCAL] From: [$LOCAL] To: [$REMOTE] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: [$CONTACT_LOCAL] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test X-SlingshotApp: [$APP_ID] Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=Sonus_UAC 515649 266606 IN IP4 192.168.102.11 s=SIP Media Capabilities c=IN IP4 192.168.102.4 t=0 0 m=audio 16130 RTP/AVP 0 18 96 101 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=rtpmap:18 G729/8000 a=fmtp:18 annexb=no a=rtpmap:96 iLBC/8000 a=fmtp:96 mode=30 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-15 a=sendrecv a=ptime:30
ACK [$CONTACT_REMOTE] SIP/2.0 Via: [$VIA_LOCAL] From: [$LOCAL] To: [$REMOTE] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] ACK Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:] Call-ID: [call_id] [last_CSeq:] Contact: [$CONTACT_LOCAL] X-Customer-Proto: HTTP Content-Length: [len] Content-Type: application/sdp
v=0 o=Sonus_UAC 846185 347560 IN IP4 192.168.102.11 s=SIP Media Capabilities c=IN IP4 192.168.102.4 t=0 0 m=audio 49786 RTP/AVP 0 101 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-15 a=sendrecv a=ptime:20
